interface.name: ddr4_sdram
interface.description: DDR4 board interface, it can use DDR4 controller IP for connection.

component.name: si5341_clock3
component.description: 100 MHz default. Clock output 3 on Si5341B. See BRK1900 documentation for more information on the programmable clock generator.

component.name: si5341_clock4
component.description: 100 MHz default. Clock output 4 on Si5341B. See BRK1900 documentation for more information on the programmable clock generator.
